sentences.en: A number of small-scale studies have already indicated that there is a relationship between diet and cancer.
sentences.cn: 一些小规模的研究已经表明，饮食和癌症之间有一种联系。

sentences.en: Rainforests easily regrow after small-scale clearing.
sentences.cn: 雨林在小规模的砍伐后很容易再生。

sentences.en: It enables small-scale farmers to harvest 175 pounds of green vegetables per hour.
sentences.cn: 它使小规模的农户每小时收获175磅的绿色蔬菜。
